name: Warlock (itch) (romeosdaydream)
description:
You're a warlock, that means you've made a pact with a powerful entity. And another. And another... Okay, you've been two-timing the patrons who gave you powers. See, they already signed the contract, they can't just un-sign the contract. But that won't stop your vengeful pact-patrons from sending their other goons to do you in!

Survive as long as you can and get to the top of the leaderboard in this roguelike auto-shooter!

Your weapons are magic so they'll fire automatically, no need to do it yourself. Just don't get hit. If your enemies touch you, you'll take damage so if you see one, run! Collect coins and buy upgrades in the shop at the end of each wave and you'll become even stronger.

Use WASD to move and mouse to select.

Online leaderboard by LootLocker.
